name: Like a Maiden
description:
10 years in the shrine made you a FUCKING PUSSY.

Some mothmen are harassing a shrine of her kind loving light Aina, go be unkind and slap them outta there.

Controls:

WASD or Left Joystick - Move

E or A/B/Circle Button - Slap

Enter/ B/A/Cross Button - Accept your fate

Made with Godot Engine 4.0 under the MIT License.

Credits to Ugasisvelta for trailer VA, Falco and factzmachine for music
